title: FONT MEXICANA
content: PLEASE MAKE SUGGESTIONS ON THAT NEW SOURCE THAT I CREATED. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023121255im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/35273.jpg)
author: mhirosse

comments.content: This face seems to have a built-in flaw in that the decorative things on the left and right sometimes link together, and sometimes do not. I'd choose one style or the other.

Sorry, John, I couldn't hear you - could you speak up?   
   
hhp
I'd be interested to see some other words set in this one. Or at least a sample that has the letters spaced out more in order to view each letter alone.
